name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Manuel D. RUIZ, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Manuel D. RUIZ, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Nino V. Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1211
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Manuel D. RUIZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Nino V. Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
